name: Dotnet CLI
description: This feature installs the latest .NET SDK, which includes the .NET CLI and the shared runtime. Options are provided to choose a different version or additional versions.

version.description: Select or enter a .NET SDK version. Use 'latest' for the latest version, 'lts' for the latest LTS version, 'X.Y' or 'X.Y.Z' for a specific version.

additionalVersions.description: Enter additional .NET SDK versions, separated by commas. Use 'latest' for the latest version, 'lts' for the latest LTS version, 'X.Y' or 'X.Y.Z' for a specific version.
